Beaverton.KRYP:
KRYP is a commercial broadcast FM radio station located in the Portland, Oregon area and owned by the Salem Media Group. KRYP is a Spanish language station playing regional Mexican music (a mix of genres such as Banda, Ranchera, Mariachi and Norteña).
The Spring 2008 Arbitron ratings saw KRYP become the Portland metropolitan area market leader, the first time a Spanish language radio station achieved that milestone.
